channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Whats Behind Perfectionism
item.description: We all feel shame to an extent. We are told to be shameless. However, shame can lead to honor. The problem is when we pursue perfect honor. This comes from Anxiety Anxiety leads to Compulsions Compulsions to Disorder Disorder to Perfectionism Give up book reading for a week, you’ll see the underlying shame. Beware of bookworms using books to shore up their sagging egos. Ashamed shame others, as hurt hurt others.
